name: Hakuoki - Okita Souji (tumblr dashboard)
description:
A Hakuoki dashboard theme for tumblr.
Made originally for myself, so a few mistakes here and there.
First time coding lol.
Also, trust me, it actually is more neat than the preview.

user.name: Kou
user.about: I'm not really a pro coder so my designs are always simple, but clean, I guess. I always try to use official art and I think coding is hell.
